user_query: I want to explore the latest developments in the Bitcoin market. Fetch me the title, URL, and source of all the news articles related to Bitcoin from major news websites. Also, provide me with the title, URL, and source of the news articles specifically from CoinDesk.

TaskList.description: Fetch all news articles related to Bitcoin from major news websites.
Extract title, URL, and source from the fetched news articles.
Fetch news articles related to Bitcoin specifically from CoinDesk.
Extract title, URL, and source from the CoinDesk articles.
